channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: "Witch Hunt": Trump Urges End To Netanyahu's Corruption Trial

media:content.media:description: "Bibi Netanyahu's trial should be CANCELLED", Trump said.

item.description: US President Donald Trump weighed in on ally Benjamin Netanyahu's long-running corruption trial Wednesday, urging for Israel's "Great War Time Prime Minister" to be exonerated after the conflict with Iran.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump weighed in on ally Benjamin Netanyahu's long-running corruption trial Wednesday, urging for Israel's "Great War Time Prime Minister" to be exonerated after the conflict with Iran.

item.title: "They Need Money": Trump Signals US May Ease Iran Oil Sanction

media:content.media:description: rump said on Wednesday that the U.S. has not given up its maximum pressure on Iran.

item.description: President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that the U.S. has not given up its maximum pressure on Iran - including restrictions on sales of Iranian oil - but signaled a potential easing in enforcement to help the country rebuild.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that the U.S. has not given up its maximum pressure on Iran - including restrictions on sales of Iranian oil - but signaled a potential easing in enforcement to help the country rebuild.

item.title: Trump Repeats Claim Of US "Obliterated" Iran Nuclear Sites

media:content.media:description: Trump has once again asserted his claims on Washington "obliterating" Iranian nuclear sites.

item.description: US President Donald Trump has once again asserted his claims on Washington "obliterating" Iranian nuclear sites during its targeted strikes on June 22, riding on Israel's assessment made by the Israel Atomic Energy Commission (IAEC) on those sites.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump has once again asserted his claims on Washington "obliterating" Iranian nuclear sites during its targeted strikes on June 22, riding on Israel's assessment made by the Israel Atomic Energy Commission (IAEC) on those sites.

item.title: "Very Close": Trump Hints At Gaza Ceasefire After Israel-Iran Truce

media:content.media:description: Trump said that progress was being made to end the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza.

item.description: US President Donald Trump said Wednesday that progress was being made to end the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza, as a new ceasefire push began more than 20 months since the start of the conflict.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump said Wednesday that progress was being made to end the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza, as a new ceasefire push began more than 20 months since the start of the conflict.

item.title: Iran Partially Reopens Airspace After Ceasefire With Israel

media:content.media:description: Iran had closed its skies since June 13. (Representational)

item.description: Iran on Wednesday reopened the airspace over the country's east, state media reported, following a ceasefire with Israel that ended 12 days of fighting.
item.content:encoded: Iran on Wednesday reopened the airspace over the country's east, state media reported, following a ceasefire with Israel that ended 12 days of fighting.

item.title: Chinese President Xi Jinping To Skip BRICS Summit In Brazil: Report

media:content.media:description: Chinese Premier and Xi's confidant Li Qiang will take part in the BRICS summit to be held in July.

item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping plans to skip the BRICS Summit in Brazil next month, which, if confirmed, will be his first-ever absence from the meeting of the grouping of emerging economies since taking office 12 years ago, according to media reports.
item.content:encoded: Chinese President Xi Jinping plans to skip the BRICS Summit in Brazil next month, which, if confirmed, will be his first-ever absence from the meeting of the grouping of emerging economies since taking office 12 years ago, according to media reports.

item.title: Shubhanshu Shukla's Axiom 4 Mission Creates History For 3 Countries

media:content.media:description: The Axiom 4 mission has created history in India, Poland, and Hungary.

item.description: The Axiom 4 launch, a commercial human spaceflight mission involving Axiom Space, NASA, and SpaceX, has scripted history in more ways than one.
item.content:encoded: The Axiom 4 launch, a commercial human spaceflight mission involving Axiom Space, NASA, and SpaceX, has scripted history in more ways than one.

item.title: Israel Thanks US' CIA For Help In "Joint" Operation Against Iran War

media:content.media:description: Israel's attacks on Iran starting June 13 targeted many atomic scientists and top military personnel.

item.description: The head of Israel's Mossad intelligence service thanked the US Central Intelligence Agency on Wednesday for its help in "joint" operations during the recent 12-day war with Iran.
item.content:encoded: The head of Israel's Mossad intelligence service thanked the US Central Intelligence Agency on Wednesday for its help in "joint" operations during the recent 12-day war with Iran.

item.title: Amazon Tycoon Jeff Bezos, Fiancee Lauren Sanchez Arrive In Venice For Lavish Wedding

media:content.media:description: Bezos and Sanchez are said to have booked out the finest hotels for a star-studded guest list.

item.description: Amazon's billionaire founder Jeff Bezos and his fiancee Lauren Sanchez arrived in Venice on Wednesday ahead of their wedding, an event that has sparked protests in the Italian city.
item.content:encoded: Amazon's billionaire founder Jeff Bezos and his fiancee Lauren Sanchez arrived in Venice on Wednesday ahead of their wedding, an event that has sparked protests in the Italian city.

item.title: Updates- Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez Arrive In Venice For Lavish Wedding

media:content.media:description: Bezos and Sanchez announced their engagement in 2023.

item.description: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and journalist Lauren Sanchez have arrived in Venice ahead of their wedding.
item.content:encoded: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and journalist Lauren Sanchez have arrived in Venice ahead of their wedding.

item.title: "He Couldn't Have Been Nicer": Trump On Zelensky Meeting

media:content.media:description: Trump said the meeting with Zelensky "couldn't have been nicer". (FILE)

item.description: US President Donald Trump said Wednesday his closely watched meeting in The Hague with Ukraine's leader Volodymyr Zelensky "couldn't have been nicer".
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump said Wednesday his closely watched meeting in The Hague with Ukraine's leader Volodymyr Zelensky "couldn't have been nicer".

item.title: Zelensky Says Discussed Buying US Air Defence Systems With Trump

media:content.media:description: We discussed the protection of our people with Trump, said Zelensky

item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Wednesday said he had discussedbuying US air-defence systems with President Donald Trump during their meeting on the sidelines of NATO's summit in The Hague.
item.content:encoded: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Wednesday said he had discussedbuying US air-defence systems with President Donald Trump during their meeting on the sidelines of NATO's summit in The Hague.

item.title: "Ground Commandos Operated Deep Inside Iran During 12-Day War": Israel

media:content.media:description: The Israel army praised the "coordination carried out by our air force and ground commandos"

item.description: The head of Israel's military said Wednesday that Israeli commandos had operated secretly inside Iran during the countries' 12-day war.
item.content:encoded: The head of Israel's military said Wednesday that Israeli commandos had operated secretly inside Iran during the countries' 12-day war.

item.title: UK Oil Major Shell Says Not In Talks To Buy Rival BP

media:content.media:description: Shell purchase of BP would trigger competition concerns, said a city index analyst.(Representational)

item.description: British oil major Shell said Wednesday it was not in talks with BP to acquire its rival, after the Wall Street Journal reported there had been preliminary discussions.
item.content:encoded: British oil major Shell said Wednesday it was not in talks with BP to acquire its rival, after the Wall Street Journal reported there had been preliminary discussions.

item.title: How South Korea's Dog Meat Ban Leaves Farmers And 500,000 Dogs In Limbo

media:content.media:description: South Korea's 2024 dog meat ban gives farmers until February 2027 to shut down

item.description: The government claims local authorities will take surrendered dogs into shelters. But rehoming is proving difficult. Farms raised large breeds like Tosa-Inu for meat, dogs often labeled "dangerous" under South Korean law.
item.content:encoded: The government claims local authorities will take surrendered dogs into shelters. But rehoming is proving difficult. Farms raised large breeds like Tosa-Inu for meat, dogs often labeled "dangerous" under South Korean law.

item.title: Iran Parliament Okays Bill To Suspend Cooperation With UN Nuclear Watchdog
item.description: Iran's parliament approved a bill on Wednesday to suspend cooperation with the UN nuclear watchdog, state-affiliated news outlet Nournews reported.
item.content:encoded: Iran's parliament approved a bill on Wednesday to suspend cooperation with the UN nuclear watchdog, state-affiliated news outlet Nournews reported.

item.title: Iranian Boy, 2, In Coma After Man Slams Him To Floor At Moscow Airport

media:content.media:description: A video grab shows the man slamming the Iranian boy to the ground

item.description: A disturbing video shows the moment a man suddenly picks up an Iranian boy and slams him to the floor in the arrivals hall of a Moscow airport.

item.title: Trump Repeats Claim That He "Stopped" India-Pak Conflict

media:content.media:description: "We stopped the nuclear war," Trump claimed. (File)

item.description: US President Donald Trump on Wednesday repeated his claim that he stopped the war between India and Pakistan and told the two countries that America would not do trade with them if continued with the fighting.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump on Wednesday repeated his claim that he stopped the war between India and Pakistan and told the two countries that America would not do trade with them if continued with the fighting.

item.title: Billionaires, Boats, Backlash: How Jeff Bezos' Venice Wedding Is Causing Uproar

media:content.media:description: Superyachts, private jets, and Hollywood A-listers are flooding Venice this week for Jeff Bezos wedding

item.description: Residents accuse Bezos of treating Venice like a billionaire's playground, ignoring the city's ongoing struggles with mass tourism, rising housing costs, and climate change.
item.content:encoded: Residents accuse Bezos of treating Venice like a billionaire's playground, ignoring the city's ongoing struggles with mass tourism, rising housing costs, and climate change.

item.title: US-Iran Talks Next Week, Nuclear Agreement May Be On Table: Donald Trump

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump said the US and Iran will hold talks next week to decide on Iran's nuclear programme

item.description: US President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that the United States and Iran "may sign an agreement" regarding Tehran's nuclear programme when the two sides meet for talks next week.
